original: Allsing, Rudolf Oskar Stig Holger, kommunalborgmästare, Tranås, f. 1/ 12/03 i Kristinehamn av bankdir. Holger A. o. Anna Linders. G. 36 m. Ingrid Arvedson. — Stud:ex. i Karlstad 22, jur. kand. i Upps. 27. Tf. rådman i Filipstad o. stadssekr. där 32-36, tf. borgmäst. där ett år, komm:-borgmäst., tilHka not. publ. i Tranås sed. 36. Ordf. i byggn :nd, hälsovmd o. hyresnd, led. av styr. f. Tranås flygkl., A-B Sveabryggerier, A-B Wermlandsbryggerier, Kristinehamns Bryggeri A-B o. Storbrohyttans A-B, ordf. i |Styr. f. Sikid- o. friluftsfrämj. loikalavd.
translated: Allsing, Rudolf Oskar Stig Holger, municipal chief executive officer, Tranås, born 1/12/03 in Kristinehamn to bank director Holger A. and Anna Linders. Married in 1936 to Ingrid Arvedson. Graduated from Karlstad with a degree in law in 1922, and earned a law degree from Uppsala in 1927. Served as acting judge in Filipstad and city secretary there from 1932-1936, acted as mayor for a year, and then became municipal chief executive officer and notary public in Tranås since 1936. He served as chairman of the building committee, health committee, and housing committee, was a member of the board of Tranås flying club, A-B Sveabryggerier, A-B Wermlandsbryggerier, Kristinehamns Bryggeri A-B, and Storbrohyttans A-B. He was also chairman of the board for the local chapter of the Ski and Outdoor Promotion Association.

education.description: Earned a law degree from Uppsala
